message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I can offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting a bit firm on my price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $155.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit far apart on the price. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $145.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not sure if $145 is the best price for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more serious concession, but I need to meet my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $150, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $150. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. This is my final offer. If not, I'll have to look elsewhere.
